name: Mooer Micro Preamp 017
details:
Mesa Boogie Mk.IV Amp ModelThe ultimate in compact and versatile Californian combos comes to the Mooer Micro Preamp range. Cali MKIV re-creates 2 channels from one of the most famous modern-day session player combos. The clean channel is shimmering and bouncy, the gain channel can achieve purring blues tones, grinding crunch and soaring lead sounds.
High quality dual channel preamp
•    Independent 3 band EQ, Gain and Volume controls for each channel
•    Speaker cabinet simulation on/off
•    2 different modes for footswitch operation. On/Off or channel A/B
•    017 is based on Mesa Boogie MK IV®
http://mooeraudio.ca/product/micro-preamp-017-cali-mkiv/
